item.title: R Machine Learning Codebook (Part 1)
item.description: R Machine Learning Codebook (Part 1) Linear Regression Used when response variable is ‘numerical’ variable getwd() ## [1] "/Users/jungyulyang/programming/school/r_blog/content/post" library(readr) #information for data usedcar2 <- read_csv("data/usedcar2.csv") ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## Price = col_double(), ## Odometer = col_double(), ## Color = col_character() ## ) usedcar2 ## # A tibble: 100 x 3 ## Price Odometer Color ## <dbl> <dbl> <chr> ## 1 14636 37388 white ## 2 14122 44758 white ## 3 14470 45854 white ## 4 15072 40149 white ## 5 14802 40237 white ## 6 14660 43533 white ## 7 15612 32744 white ## 8 14632 41350 white ## 9 15008 35781 white ## 10 14666 48613 white ## # … with 90 more rows Encoding categorical variable
